item.title: Visual novel Re:Burn The Bonfire of Taiwan announced for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

An interactive reimagining of popular Taiwanese soap opera.

Publisher eastasiasoft and Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double developer toii have announced Re:Burn The Bonfire of Taiwan, an interactive reimagining of popular Taiwanese soap opera The Bonfire of Taiwan. It will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2025 with English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language support.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A classic drama is reborn in anime style!

Step into an interactive reimagining of popular Taiwanese soap opera The Bonfire of Taiwan, fully licensed and ready to set the stage for a new generation of fans! Re:Burn The Bonfire of Taiwan puts you in control of the narrative, allowing you to guide the beloved characters to endings from the original show, complete with unlockable live action clips of iconic scenes, or make choices that lead to unique game-exclusive outcomes!

With each chapter, you can choose to play from multiple perspectives and navigate the city map. Confront “boss” characters through direct combat or a war of words, use items like DNA test results and divorce agreements to state your case, rely on other characters’ unique support skills, leverage property deeds and more as the conflict between rival families heats up!

Of course, romance is a key element in any great drama, so manage your relationships carefully, going on dates and making key decisions to get characters together or break them up! The choice is yours, and with cleared chapters available to try again any time, there’s loads of possibilities waiting to be explored!

Key Features

  • Enjoy anime aesthetics and a huge cast of memorable characters!
  • Control the drama with key decisions as the narrative unfolds.
  • Select various characters to view chapters from different perspectives!
  • Use your allies’ support skills when it’s time to confront rival bosses.

View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Starsand Island details romance and friendship system
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

"Ultra-realistic simulation, deep emotional connections, and limitless interaction."

Seed Lab has released a new trailer and information for life simulation game Starsand Island introducing the game’s romance and relationship system.

“We’re aiming to make the inhabitants of Starsand Island truly compelling individuals, each with their own engaging personalities and long-term personal goals,” said Seed Lab technical director Goltan Gao in a press release. “We are looking to break new ground in how players will establish and nurture vibrant relationships with NPC inhabitants, building bonds as they interact with them throughout their time in the game, so islanders—and their stories—feel truly alive.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the system, via Seed Lab:

■ How Starsand Island Redefines NPC Bonds

Core Vision

With a focus on ultra-realistic simulation, deep emotional connections, and limitless interaction, Starsand Island aims to become a “The Sims of the farming genre”, breaking new ground in how players build relationships with NPCs in a rural life sim.

I. Intertwined interactions

1. Lively, Authentic NPCs

We’ve infused our NPCs with lifelike memory, perception, emotions, and independent decision-making; every character on Starsand Island even has long-term personal goals.

Players can help them achieve these dreams, growing together along the way. NPCs will give you context-sensitive requests based on their progress, and they actively respond to what’s happening around them. For example: snap a photo and they’ll strike a pose; pass by, and they’ll greet you; animal lovers will go out of their way to pet any stray cat or dog they spot. The islanders feel truly alive and are proactive.

2. Unique, Rich Interactions

Most farming sims offer NPC chats and gift-giving, but Starsand Island goes further: every key character has signature interactions reflecting their personality. Maybe you’ve started a friendship with an islander who moonlights as a fortune teller? You can join them for a reading, complete with a touch of mysticism—sometimes with real-life advice!

Plus, the island is packed with interactive objects, so you can ride bikes together, swing side by side, have sleepovers, even binge-watch TV.

3. Realistic, Gradual Relationship Growth

  • Organic, Repeatable Bonding – Build rapport through daily chats, gifts, invites, and teamwork—not just scripted story beats. Relationships feel genuine and continuous, rather than “checklist” moments.
  • Responsive Dialogue – As bonds deepen, NPC conversations and reactions evolve, showing off unique quirks and gestures. No more cardboard cutouts—your new friends feel real.

4. Deep Immersion in Daily Life

  • Action-Driven Events and QTEs – Key moments blend quick-time events and animation, with realistic details and true-to-life NPC responses, so you feel right in the heart of the story.
  • Dynamic Personal Events – Get surprise gifts, receive heartfelt letters, accept special requests, and unlock unique storylines for each NPC. Every friendship grows like a “life tree,” branching in new directions.

5. Customization and Growing Together

  • Relationship-Driven Gameplay – Your bond impacts everything, from how well NPCs help you collect resources to the rewards they give for completing jobs. The closer you are, the more they’ll pitch in and the better your rewards.
  • Personalized Nicknames – Customize how you and your friends address each other. Unique relationship labels and emotional replies from NPCs help you feel truly connected.

6. Integrated Social and Homebuilding Systems

  • Islanders, Not Tools – NPCs aren’t just quest-givers, they’re genuine friends with dreams, moods, and personalities. Their lives intertwine with yours, shaping the island’s entire community and how your home evolves.

7. Heartfelt Stories and Everyday Warmth

  • Heart Stories, Side Quests, and Banters – Each “heart level” unlocks new story chapters and slice-of-life side quests. Main plots and daily moments blend seamlessly, for a world that feels alive.
  • Surprise Rewards and Easter Eggs – Hidden events, Kabedons, rare items, and special animations keep things fresh and full of emotional payoffs.

II. Experience Overview—“It’s More Than Just Romance in Dialogue”

1. NPCs Grow and Remember

Every conversation, gift, or invitation leaves a mark. NPCs remember your habits and preferences. How often and how you interact shapes the future, creating shared memories unique to you.

2. NPCs Are Part of Your Daily Life, And Your Home

Relationships aren’t just a number. They have a real impact on production, resource gathering, and how your homestead develops. Get closer, and you’ll unlock more convenience, emotional satisfaction, and a thriving community.

3. Two-Way Growth for Emotional and Mutual Benefit

Friendship isn’t one-sided. NPCs will reach out to you, show care, ask for help, and give back in meaningful ways. Every relationship has its own flavor and story arc, supporting multiple endings and personalized companionship.

Conclusion

Our relationship system is a core innovation of Starsand Island:

  • In Starsand Island, friendships and relationships that are vibrant, authentic, and have emotional growth come alive through daily moments.
  • Every NPC can become your dearest companion, helping you write your own heartfelt story in a world that feels truly yours.

Starsand Island is due out this winter for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam.

item.title: THQ Nordic Digital Showcase 2025 set for August 1
item.content:encoded:
World premieres, updates, and surprises ahead.

THQ Nordic will host THQ Nordic Digital Showcase 2025 on August 1 at 12:00 p.m. PT / 3:00 p.m. ET, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube, Twitch, and Steam.

The showcase will feature “a feast of world premiere announcements, fresh updates on previously announced titles,” including “some long-awaited release dates” and “a few surprises [THQ Nordic] didn’t hint at already.”

Featured titles include Gothic Remake, Titan Quest II, REANIMAL, The Eternal Life of Goldman, Wreckfest 2, and “many more” to be announced.

“We’ve kept a few aces up our sleeve,” THQ Nordic teased. “Think dark and thrilling or colorful and heartwarming or even a true family game—and a couple that nobody’s expecting (No, it’s still not the Spanish Inquisition—sorry).”

item.title: Arc System Works Showcase set for June 27 featuring new game announcements
item.content:encoded:
New title announcements planned, including new project by Daisuke Ishiwatari.

Arc System works will host Arc System Works Showcase on June 26 at 6:00 p.m. PT / 9:00 p.m. ET / June 27 at 10:00 JST, featuring the latest information on Arc System Works, including the announcement of new titles, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

In addition to the latest information on various game titles, including completely new titles developed and published by Arc System Works, Arc System Works will also announce a new project that Daisuke Ishiwatari is working on.

Stay tuned.
